UPDATE: Select CPD Papers and Jan/San supplies are now ordered through a punchout catalog. If the item you order returns this error message: "No Results Found", proceed to "SUPPLIER WEBSITE CATALOGS (Punchouts)" and then click on the applicable punchout, i.e., "CPD Store Supplies" or "Jan/San Supplies" to place an order instead of searching by iPro #.

For further information regarding CPD paper ordering process changes, reference the Inventory Supply Sheet found on the Store Portal. For further information regarding Jan/San supplies, refer to the Jan/San Buy from Ourselves Memo found on the Store Portal.
